name: Country Life
description:
The game is still in development, this is the first version, but completely playable.

The mouse is not supported, only keyboard.

Move with arrows (left shift for autorepeat),  

Other commands:

d for dig (close to mountain, and with a pickaxe on the hand);

c for cutting tree;

a for other activities;

t for trade (only on the doors of buildings)

... and so on (all visible in the left part of screen).

The weather is simulated carefully (i.e. snow depending of temperature and elevation) .

Tested on Windows7 64bit
